name.description: Name of the agent; used primarily for logging

register_type.description: Type of registration; will be used when auctioning for placement (--type)

description.description: A user friendly description of the agent

max_workloads.description: The maximum number of workloads this agent can hold. 0 indicates unlimited

public_xkey.description: The public xkey of the agent. Node will encrypt environment with this key

supported_lifecycles.description: List of capabilities supported by the agent

start_request_schema.description: JSONSchema shape for the start request; enforced by node
